aboutSection.title: About me
aboutSection.text1: Hi! I'm Walter, I'm 37 years old and I'm a Junior Frontend Developer. Throughout my life I've always taken very different paths from programming, both in my studies and in my work. I have a bachelor's degree in architecture and have almost always worked in the commercial world. However, all these paths did not satisfy me.
aboutSection.text2: For these reasons, I approached the world of programming out of curiosity to learn new things and the desire to get involved. I heard about a 6-month intensive online course for web developers and I decided to attend it. It was hard because before then I had never programmed, but with commitment and perseverance I managed to finish the course with good results and, a few months after, I found a job in a cosmetics company: a great experience of about 9 months in which I was able to put into practice what I had learned during my studies.
aboutSection.text3: The world of web development, especially the frontend part, is very stimulating and allows me to express my creativity. That's why I always try to keep up to date and learn new technologies. During the pandemic I was able to take advantage of the time available to learn the basics of the framework VueJS, with which I have created this site and the projects you will find in the portfolio section.
aboutSection.imgCaption: To code, or not to code, that is the question.
